summary: An FBI email from July 11, 2019, discussing the scheduling of an interview with a new victim of Jeffrey Epstein at the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The email coordinates a meeting between the victim, her attorneys, and a service provider named Laura.

persons.name: Laura
persons.context: Addressed in the email as the recipient; the sender is requesting that Laura meet with a new Epstein victim and her attorneys after an interview to offer services.

connections.description: Laura is being asked to meet with the victim to offer services after the victim's interview.

events.title: Interview of new Epstein victim at SDNY
events.description: A new victim of Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled to be interviewed at the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

keyFacts: A new victim of Jeffrey Epstein was being interviewed by SDNY on July 12, 2019.
The FBI email was coordinating support services for the victim through a contact named Laura.
The victim was represented by attorneys during the interview process.
The email indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein in July 2019, shortly before his death.
